column1: The Kuala Pilah District is a district in central Negeri Sembilan
Kuala Pilah District is divided into 11 mukims
Ulu MuarThe district also home to Sri Menanti
column2: the official residence of the Yang di-Pertuan Besar of Negeri Sembilan.
